shahd.name: SHAHD
shahd.title: The Journey of Maya Johnson
shahd.quote: In "Becoming Me: The Journey of Maya Johnson," readers will discover the inspiring story of a woman who followed her passions, overcame challenges, and made a difference in the world of technology. Maya's journey serves as a reminder that with determination and perseverance, anything is possible.

maya.name: MAYA
maya.title: The Journey of Maya Johnson
maya.quote: In "Becoming Me: The Journey of Maya Johnson," readers will discover the inspiring story of a woman who followed her passions, overcame challenges, and made a difference in the world of technology. Maya's journey serves as a reminder that with determination and perseverance, anything is possible.

about.welcome_paragraph_1: Welcome to Vision, your portal to the realm of Egyptian craftsmanship and innovation.
about.welcome_paragraph_2: Based in Egypt, Vision is deeply rooted in the country's rich tradition of artistry, with a focus on glass and porcelain decoration.
about.location_paragraph: Located in Samannoud City, historically renowned for pottery manufacturing, our firm embraces the evolution of craftsmanship.
about.commitment_paragraph: With a commitment to modernization, Vision revitalizes Egypt's glassmaking sector, equipping local manufacturers with cutting-edge technologies and materials.
about.participation_paragraph: Participation in industry events and exhibitions has cemented our role in facilitating collaboration and innovation.
about.website_paragraph: This website marks a pivotal moment for Vision, signaling our ambition to expand globally.

address.location: Samanoud, Gharbia, Egypt. El-Nahas Square, Zayed Tower, 7th Floor, No. 701.
